refinery 0.0.0.9056
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

article_named()

Locate articles matching a pattern

insert_appendix()

Inserts the default refinery appendix

insert_lockfile()

Inserts a link to the lock file

insert_netlify_redirect()

Setup redirections for netlify deployment

insert_source()

Inserts a link to the source code

insert_timestamp()

Records a time stamp to the R markdown output

renv_delete()

Delete the renv set up associated with a post

renv_load()

Load the renv library

renv_new()

Create a minimal R environment for a post

renv_restore()

Restore the renv project

renv_snapshot()

Create a snapshot of the R environment for the post

use_article_template()

Create new article from existing template
